data.title: Assisted Living Near Quincy
data.meta_description: Located less than 5 miles from Quincy, Standish Village is a complete renovation of the Fabreeka Mills Textile Factory. Our neighborhood…
data.text:
Located less than 5 miles from Quincy, Standish Village is a complete renovation of the Fabreeka Mills Textile Factory. Our neighborhood, skirting the beautiful Neponset River, is bustling with life, surrounded by newly developed condos, eateries and local businesses. We offer gracious Assisted Living and a secure Compass Memory Support Neighborhood® for those with Alzheimer’s and related dementia.

Residents enjoy the independence and privacy of their own apartment home along with the sense of belonging, security and companionship that comes from a supportive senior community just outside their door. In addition to having several residents from Quincy, we have built strong relationships in the area, including bringing our educational programs to the Quincy Council on Aging and sponsoring their Memory Cafe.

Take a Step Inside Standish Village
